values:
Hello LJ my old fiend. I should ramble on in here again. I miss it and I miss the peoples! But first I will make tea. 

<lj-embed id="49"/>

this is a thing I made recently, its clips of me hooooooooooping with a hoop and some bellydancing set to a gorgeous gorgeous song made for me by <lj user="mssoxx"> who is, lets face it, a bit of a winner. My camera is on a weird angle that makes me look extra wiiiide in the hoop bits but whatever, width is as good as depth yes? AM I RIGHT? So that is what I have been doing lately, learning to bellydance and hoop, and drinking all the tea. Hooping in a corset is awkward, this it truth.

And now I die of love. Alex Antebi of Conquistador. And now! Eighty five thousand million snillion gazillion quadrabillion brazillian more photos of him! Yeeeeeees. Oh My God. I am going to explode with love! Or at the very least be sick or have to breathe into a paper bag :D If no one ever sees me again its because I have locked myself into a room with pictures of this guy as the wallpaper, carpet, roof, floor... blasting his music hahahaa insane love! Isnt he glorious???????????????????????????? <3<3<3 I could really really really die! Oh this is bad! THE PAIN!!!!!!!!!!! Haha! "Hosted by The Handle Bar Club, one of the largest and most well-respected mustache establishments, Antebi, the newest club member (featured recently in The New York Times) was crowned world champion at the WBMCs in the Imperial Moustache division. This was the only category judged exclusively by facial hair aficionado himself, Nick Cave. Bestowed with this great honor while donned in a Vermeer, Victorian veneer of his own Alexander Antoinette design (Antebi's luxury clothing and apparel line w/partner Ashley Hester)" AND AND AND! "Conquistador has also collaborated on a single of epic proportions with members of Swedish band The Ark." :D :D :D :D

<lj-cut text="dancey videos hehehe">

gaaaaaaah bdfdfgdf brrr EEEH! Brad Silberling is yummy. The spirit moved me while I was taking pictures! :D Genuinely singing along to Lets Get It On (BEST SONG! So obsessed lately!) in my messy kitchen and doing appalling funky movements! To the Jack Black version from High Fidelity ok? Its raining so much here! Icant believe it! I was going to go and do things out and about today but I would have been washed away walking to the bus! It looks like night time all day! But the droughty farmers are still sad, not much has changed apparently. It's my brothers birthday soon! That is all!

I should be packing! I think of all kinds of crap to do when I *have* to do something! I've dyed my hair, sewn more leaves on my boots, cleaned the bathroom, mixed a custom perfume for Goblyn, cut his fringe, plucked my eyebrows, talked to sexy pirate men on the phone :D mixed old lipsticks together to make a new colour, played guitar, looked up pictures of pan & the green man for my tattoo, brushed the dogs, sat here listening to music, danced to music, lay in the sun and burned myself. HAHA bright pink hair with a red sunburned face looks so bad it's good hahaha like a strawberry clown! USELESS!

"This is a polar bear, it primarily eats seals. Can you eat a seal? The polar bear is better than you."

So good. I was laughing for days after watching this, aaaaah! Best! It was on tv and I nearly suffocated from love and laughter and then eeeeeeeeeeeeee I found it online, my joy is boundless!

I LOVE HER! Listen to her sing! BEST creepiest most pretty song and she should ALWAYS DRESS LIKE THAT! AND RIDE A BROOMSTICK!

I got a house! A HOUSE A HOUSE! Exams this week then soon I will move to a house across the road from a rainforest! OMG! SO TIRED! BRAIN FRIED!

I love this set of images so much I feel ill! I'm going to have to buy them all! Wombat. I die. Sleeping Roo Boy. OMG <3 Emu Chick LOVE LOVE LOVE Wombat Soooo gorgeous Thorny Devil!!!!!! I would pee my pants if I saw one! & then I'd try to think of a good way to send it to ;D Mudlarks! Best! Alastair McNaughton

I'm all a-twitter! I have been wanting a tattoo for some time, something to remind me of wild woods and fauns, pan etc I still want that ring of faeries, around my upper arm. I just love that its all black and solid and they don't have faces and they just seem, a bit evil, spikey haired, dancy and ...um... gender-less? haha THEY SO WOULDNT CARE WHAT YOU THINK KTHNX! Which I guess I want, also their wings are skeletal and veiny and they are from my old old book of Peter Pan and Wendy which helped my obsession. I also want my favourite quote "while green leaves glisten and while bright stars burn" that's a sort of pledge I suppose, to... I'm not sure but if I was religious it would be all about stars and leaves. Well I AM religious and it is all about stars and leaves :D Its also a reminder of like....hope and potential, as long as green leaves glisten and bright stars burn, yes which is me because I am insanely optimistic about everything and I hope I stay this way. I sort of want that in a nice, curly but ordinary looking handwriting, like it wasnt really intentional, like I wrote it on my arm, but then I want some little autumn leaves, curly vines and stars with it. I also need the poision faeries and mushrooms by Liselotte! I am so hesitant about that because... how will they get it right? They WON'T BE LISIS! That is the one I will need the fanciest, bestest artist for. I also want loads more Liselotte, Johanna and Brian Froud pictures but if I try to decide I start to hyperventilate! As you know *strokes moustache* I quite like teh manliness. Im very girly on the surface but I have a deep thing with male energy, *lascivious wink* when I was really witchy I LOVED PAN! OH MY GOD LITERALLY! PAN! GO THE GOD OF THE WOODLANDS! Cernunos, all of them, everything, I'm a man-godloving child! I would be on Oberon's side for shore ;D Rah! Horns, hooves, and just sort of you know... testosterone. GIVE ME THE YANG! NO YING! WE HATES THE YING! And *whispers* I hardly cared at all for the goddess! OMG! I'm sure she understands, I will probably go all goddessy when I'm older... maybe. I'm just not a womanly woman, I'm a thing. And Anyway I want something all Pan or Green man but I CANT DECIDE ON ONE, EVER! So anyway, I explained that craply, I guess I'll find one when the time is right... ripe? Also, I need some kind of skeleton dealy... like a day of the dead type/skellington dancing one but it'll be like...a hedgehog or a lobster or something! THEN! When I saw the new narnia movie I was kind of un-in-love? And its easy to make me love things! Put in a few trees, some tinkly music, shiny armour, fauns and polar bears and I'm YOURS BABY, but for some reason, there was no love. Except for the scene when Tummnus goes kind of evil with his pipes and fireplace and that rockin faun music comes on. The shadowy fauns in the fire! I want them! As tattoos! Sillhouetty ones! I have been waiting ever since I saw it, to screencap those fauns and attack a tattoo artist with them. Then of course there will need to be something maritime, ships, pirates or doomed sailors etc. Maybe an anchor with some lyrics from "Cabin Fever" By nick & teh seeds of badness! Hehe Also, I dare myself to get something Stevey.... maybe the word crikey on my foot or something hehe just a tiny tribute. *doesnt care what you think* :P I'll force myself to get at least one of them done on my birthday! 5th of December! So I have a bit of time to save up *rubs hands* I just procrastinate! I already know who I want to do it, he did a gorgeous crisp black black tattoo on my friend Kezia and he was just good and had an excellent vibe. And in the place there was a sign saying "YES WE DO TATTOO REMOVAL" With ...... A huge CHAINSAW attached to it! <3 AAHH! LOVE! SO GOOD! HEEEE! capricorn , Deep Forest Creature, Pear I adore that! I'd never seen it! The faerie tastes like pears when I look at this picture! Me as a faun!!! LOVE! oooh Green Faerie OH! Happy ohh!!!! WIND oooh Prince of the White Roses Grapes Draven Snapdragon I'd never narrow that down. No-one could, not even Mr Narrowdown of the Narrow Downs. Actually, Pear and Capricorn are in the lead as of this moment. I need them all though! Then I'd have to become a ...biker or something. YAY! Oh! There are bikers around here that ride through the foresty roads all the time and then go to the posh touristy cafes *loves them* FOREST BIKERS AT POSH CAFES! EDIT: He beat me and I utterly love him!

I hate today. Steve Irwin, the quirky Australian naturalist who won worldwide acclaim, has died in a marine accident off Australia's northeast coast, local media reported on Monday I'm so fucking sad. I don't have the words, I loved him SOOOOOO much! I was always just so glad of him being there, doing his thing for conservation. Best. Guy. Ever. Iv'e never been this sad over the death of a "celebrity" it felt like someone I knew, I really really loved him. And I'm so grateful I heard from a friend and not the tv or something. I feel really really strange. And shaky. I'm going to watch the special on him tonight and cry lots more. Picspam because he was so so very much with the awesome. hehehe Baby Steve! Mullet! Puppy Sui! grown up Sui :) I will miss him so much :( and.. his family I cant imagine :(

OMG SPRING!!!

Come oooon Spring! I am ready for ya!

Ahahahaaa! This bit of this show by Dylan Moran (BERNARD!) about French stereotypes always makes me die from glee. "Lets make love again instead of eating" "No! Oh, zee sings you do to me... I am so sore! Even my toenails hurt." "Come on, you know you vant eet." French thingy on youtube Also! Please make a booking for me at the Adam Ant school of Dance. Goody Two Shoes thingy Look at him go! His legs aren't connected to his hips and his hips aren't connected to the rest of him! I am so mindlessly jealous of his hyperactive legs! Hahaaa somebody take youtube away from me! I'm a shadowy youtube obsessed person!

I want this photo on my I.D and stuff now hehe I look better as a guy. Well a moustached girl. But strangely chubbier. I think in some of these I look a bit like a MAN with lipstick and blush. Now for a hundred more crap fuzzy pictures: I tried to do my moustache like Sawyer from LOST cause he's a paragon of silly manliness. And I copied David Beckhams makeup :D Grrr. Now Im really annoyed that I'm not a guy! OMG @ my hideous curtains in the background haha!

Haha I got so excited to have a camera to play with that I took photos of myself in my pyjamas and an overcoat with a cold, a plastic cowboy hat and no worthwhile makeup(something is very wrong) Something hilarious was happening obviously? 0_o With a cat! HAT! But as if I would ever wear a tomato orange hat! :D Its meant to be pink but the camera is the camera of great yellowness. Here I think I also must have been lauging at mr kitty, I made a video of him washing his tail you see! I look in possession of a cold here. Yay! In front of my mushroom tent, posing like a roight geeza. How I love that tent!

Music survey stolen from List 12 musical artists you like (do this before reading the questions below). 1: Led Zeppelin 2: Robots In Disguise 3: E.N 4: Bryan Ferry/Roxy Music 5: Caprice 5: Billy Idol 6: Oingo Boingo 7: Brendan Perry 8: The Changelings 9: The Tiger Lillies 10: Sisters of Mercy 11: Jethro Tull 12: Cyndi Lauper What was the first song you ever heard by 2?: Boys! What is your favourite album of 6?: I dont know properly because I am disgraceful and only own mp3s but probably if I wasnt such a parasite it would be Dead Man's Party. What is your favorite lyric of 2?: TURN IT UP I WOKE UP WEAK TODAY AND NEEDING YOUR VOICE CRAWLED INTO THE SPEAKERS AND TURNED UP THE VOLUME FELT SO SICK TODAY BUT CURED BY YOUR NOISE MY HEAD IN THE SPEAKERS IS DROWNING OUT VOLUMES IN ASHES TO ASHES IM FALLING FALLING IN ASHES TO ASHES IM LOSING LOSING IN CURL AND GRAZES IM FEELING FEELING IN CURL AND GRAZES IM LOSING LOSING TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN IT UP TURN ME ON I DRESS UP BRIGHT TONIGHT AND NEEDING THE BEAT DANCE INTO THE SPEAKERS AND MAX UP THE VOLUME FEEL SO HIGH TONIGHT AND MOVED BY MY FEET MY HEART IN THE SPEAKERS IS LOVING THE VOLUME IN PRETTY VACANT IM JUMPING JUMPING IN PRETTY VACANT IM MOVING MOVING IN TEACHES OF PEACHES IM SPEEDING SPEEDING IN TEACHES OF PEACHES IM MOVING MOVING IN DELIAS GONE ILL KEEP IT WITH MINE BIRDLAND CLOUDS IN SOUS LE SOLEIL EXACTEMENT SUNSHINE SUPERMAN I WANT YOU GHOSTS IN SOME VELVET MORNING PAPER WINGS VIRGINIA AVENUE LAURA IN SUMMERS ALMOST OVER I WALK THE LINE A NIGHT LIKE THIS STRANGE FRUIT I'm sorry but as if I'm going to go through and de-CAPSLOCK the whole thing. What is your favorite song by 7? Voyage of Bran. NO Medusa! (blue, no yellow!) Is there a song of 11 that makes you sad?: I dont think so. They all make me very wistful and almost sad but a good feeling. (Plus I havent heard ALL their songs) What is your favorite song by 8?: Probably Mata Hari at the moment but normally Flowers Cover Your Eyes (for like a thouuusand years) What is your favorite song by 10?: Some Kind of Stranger! GUH! What is your favorite album by 1? Oh bugger, that is too hard to answer. Probably IV, or the BBC sessions. How did you get into 5?: I have no idea, he's always been one of my biggest heros. I remember when I was like... four or something really young I was obsessed with the Cradle of Love and when the video clip came on my dad was all "ooooh, this is a bit grown up for you I think" and used to turn it off. And I was like AAAAAARGH! Give it back! So that would have made me rebellious I'm sure. But seriously how cool is Billy Idol? TEH COOLEST. He's so boppy and yet at the same time he's rawrrrrrwr! His guitarist and fashion sense also own my soul. What is your favorite song by 9?: Bully Boys or Fidgety Phil. Make decisions I cannot. Who is your favorite band member in 12?: Duh... What is a good memory concerning 4?: Probably laughing at the video clip for Stick Together when I was little. PROFOUND! Is there a song by 3 that makes you sad?: Sabrina! But its a kind of *OMG Blixa! Marry me* sadness. Not really, I keep getting not very sad results for these despite the fact that most things in minor keys will make me blubber! :D What is your favorite song of 1?: Achilles Last Stand (today) How did you become a fan of 3?: I became obsessed with CNS from hearing it played at a club. But also the video for "the weeping song" made me go *OMFG BLIXA* and then I researched him :) Which of the 12 has influenced you the most??: "I drove all nigh"t probably, its my favourite anyway. It cant have influenced me that much because I dont drive lolz111 Which artist makes you the most happy??: Probably Caprice, I listen to them while looking around at the pastoral landscape and go "eeeeeeh" hehe But I think Oingo Boingo make me bouncier than anything ever has before. Which artist makes you the most sad?: Brendan Perry. Which artist makes the best dance music?: I dance alot to Robots In Disguise or Oingo Boingo. I often stub my toe to them. Which artist have you liked the longest?: Led Zeppelin. I was just born with a love for them haha and it only gets worse every day. Jimmy Page and Bonzo are my especial faves. But Robert Plant is such a faerie man! I have a pin of their symbol on my jacket and I nearly died when I almost lost it haha. I used to sing & play guitar in a band and we mostly played zeppelin songs and at band practice we would sit around watching the Unplugged No Quarter hehe. I also have more pictures of Jimmy Page on my computer than I care to reveal. And I have a dreadful feeling I will never get to see Jimmy or Robert live. I think the last time they came to Australia I was 7 or something? The bastards. Which artist have you liked the shortest?: Oingo Boingo. Lisis's fault (I think originally Tim's) thankyou you penguins-in-leather-pants! I love Danny Elfman soundtracks (who doesnt) but nghgnnnnnnnnnng WHAT was I thinking not knowing! When I was fifteen I was all "Hmm Jack Skellington has a voice like a slightly evil, hot music teacher that you fall in love with/lust after" and haha that is so what he is! My biggest obsession at the moment, (apart from marmalade but thats very boring) and one I know is not going away. I annoy people about them/Danny so much! I watch all the extras on Tim Burton films and squee! And I heard him singing something on the Simpsons and turned into a banana from the joy! So angry and happy and evil and and insane and clever and sarcastic and VOICE and GLEE and BEST music. New guitarist/s to love now also. Are there any artists you will still be listening to in 20 years?: I dont think I will ever get new taste in music :D

Podcasty mp3 thing! Here is probably my biggest hero of all time, Noel Fielding talking to one of his heroes Gary Numan (also vastly heroic to me :D) OMG SQUEE! GLEE! HEE! *is dead from teh love* http://entertainment.timesonline.co.uk/section/0,,27052,00.html

The Wind in the Willows Sang softly to me Follow my voice Wherever it leads Through mountains and valleys And deep rolling seas Born on the wings of the breeze Spin me a dream Woven silver and gold Of sunshine and shadows And days long ago Where people are memories And stories unfold Willows, the tales you have told me Wind in the Willows You just seem to know Who you can turn to And which way to go To unwind your wondrous mind Wind in the Willows Take me home.
on a silleh note! Rita Skeeter is totally my new wife. I'm obsessed with beetles anyway! And she can turn into one. And she has... acid green things. Acid green! And she's played by my beloved Miranda!
Goodnight.
hehe my favourite hehehehe
~made the crown out of leaves given to me by goblyn's dad. I wish it was autumn! Aaaah!
Dodgy digital camera photos of a ridiculously gorgeous sunrise the other morning.

OI! 'ere's ya flower! The other morning (when I say morning I mean like.. 4:30) Goblyn opened the door and was saying things like "Quick! Come and look at it!" And there shined a shiny poppy in the middle of the garden. And we said... "Where is the camera?" It was my poppy that I put in the ground when it wasnt happy in its shop-pot! It was redder than the reddest thing this place has ever seen. I'm so glad we took photos because there followed a great storm of thrashing bashing winds and bone chillin' rains! Oh the wind was lashing lustily And the trees were thrashing thrustily And the leaves were rustling gustily ~Winnie The Pooh Next day the poppy was flattened and soggy and blobby :( Thats the big tree I'm always going on about. The one thats 3 elephants wide and fourty high? Mmhmm
Sorry, nothing could induce me to put this behind a cut! Brian Froud! <3 Oh the squeeing! You simply cannot imagine! :D http://www.got-goblins.com !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Squasages! Haha! Say it! Squasage/skwosij /n. 1 Squashy sausage 2 Anything of or pertaining to such a device. (origin) [Not from Latin. Brought about by the lack of speech coordination when trying (for reasons unknown) to talk about the squashy sausages that Hagrid has in his coat pocket in the first Harry Potter book.] HEEHEE! By 1897, Barrie's reputation as a novelist and playwright was firmly established on both sides of the Atlantic. He had married the actress Mary Ansell in 1894, and although they had no children, Barrie already numbered several among his intimates. An early child-friend was the poet W E Henly's four-year-old daughter Margaret, who referred to Barrie as "my friendy". This coyness was compounded by a fashionable inability to pronounce her r's, and the word came out as "fwendy" or "wendy". Margaret died when she was six, but Barrie immortalized her in Peter Pan by christening his heroine Wendy, thus creating a new name. :( awww!
